key.title: Maker Channel Key
key.description: This key is created for you once you activate the Maker Channel on IFTTT. [Connect the channel](https://internal-api.ifttt.com/maker), then copy the key here.

triggers.buttonDescription: Create triggers for every IFTTT Recipe you wish to use. This Addon does not do anything until Triggers are configured.
triggers.description: The Event Name should match the field in the Recipe. If an Argument Type is specified, the Argument will be passed to IFTTT Action as 'Event1'.
